As an AI language model, I'm glad I could help you! Here are some suggestions for finding Hearthstone players online:

1. Play Mode: The Play mode is the default game mode in Hearthstone, and it will automatically match you up with another player. If you're new to the game, I suggest starting here to build up your skills. 2. Friends: You can also connect with friends who play Hearthstone by adding them to your Friends list within the game or connecting with them on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, or Reddit. 3. Tournaments: Joining tournaments or online events is an excellent way to meet like-minded players who are also dedicated to the game. You can even start your own Hearthstone competitions and challenge your friends to compete against each other. 4. Lobbies: Hearthstone has an official in-game lobby that lets you chat and connect with other players. Engage in conversations, connect with other players, and, who knows, maybe you could find someone to play with. 5. Hearthstone subreddits: There are online communities, such as /r/hearthstone, that connect you with other players, discuss strategy, and provide general advice. Remember, the game is more fun when you're able to interact with other players, so take advantage of the various resources available to find other players and strengthen your Hearthstone community.
